column5: Saw an OFC'r today while @ the lights on Upper Wellington and Rymal.. But I am unsure who it was??  I called out the truck window and said hello LOL  Who is it?  Gerritt.
More clues, what were you driving, what was he/she driving????? What time????
They were in an older pickup and I was in my F150.. this was around 12:30pm
You said Hi to a stranger? In TO?,  Hmmm, I bet you scared him!
Well they must not have been driving a Dodge, 'cuz you wouldn't have said hi....wasn't me
